subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova, a fighter at heart, sought shade between points and unforced errors and eventually found a way to advance past Camille Pin, 6-3, 4-6, 9-7.
snippet: Maria Sharapova, a fighter at heart, sought shade between points and unforced errors and eventually found a way to advance past Camille Pin, 6-3, 4-6, 9-7.
